sentence: I highly recommend this hotel and if you enjoy nature the grounds and golf courses were beautiful
The hotel is located on two terrific golf courses that we have played in the past
Great place to stay if you have a family or golf outing too
We have a great view of the golf course it is very lovely
I also went to the spa and it was nice
This was our eight return trip to the Renaissance Indian Wells Resort and Spa and each time is like coming home
Great gym with a sauna and steam room
The pool is nice and the golf is good for a resort facility
Found out about this hotel from Red Tricycle which has a nice article summarizing why this is a great place for families and the article was spot on
One casual sports bar an italian and a sushi place
I wanted to find out about golf and nobody was there even called that and was told to leave a message
There does n’t appear to be much to do other than golf in walking distance from the hotel
The concierge is hit or miss but hey if you want to golf they have got you covered
My wife has used the spa several times and has been very pleased
There were services I was looking forward to that were unavailable for example the spa was closed
Unique wood shutters covering the sliding door to small balcony could be opened to spectacular views of the mountains and overlooking the golf course
And if you play golf or and tennis do not look any further

I gave it a 2 start rating only because i was bothered by the fact I booked 2 SPA massage treatments for my husband and I and when we got there they shorted my time and said it was only 50 minutes when online it said 60 minutes and even though i showed them proof
Outdoor gathering areas are lovely but no service and indoors is as bright as a basketball gym with zero ambiance
I do n’t golf but the course looks great
